Oak Technical Services

Bringing government software projects to fruition

Services

Project Management

OTS knows how to manage projects -- demonstrated on some of California's largest and most complex projects. Technology is not the most difficult challenge to overcome on the largest projects, and we understand this.

Agile Development

Managing a single agile team is hard, but try integrating multiple dependant teams. OTS is actively doing this on California's Child Welfare project, arguably the largest agile government project in the country.

Legacy Modernization

OTS has experience with legacy modernization that can translate into success for your most difficult modernization projects.
